title: Establishment of the Federal Bank for Cooperatives and Regulation of Cooperative Banking (Repeal) Act, 2018 (Act No_XXVI of 2018)
title_en: Establishment of the Federal Bank for Cooperatives and Regulation of Cooperative Banking (Repeal) Act, 2018 (Act No_XXVI of 2018)
description: Official consolidated text of Establishment of the Federal Bank for Cooperatives and Regulation of Cooperative Banking (Repeal) Act, 2018 (Act No_XXVI of 2018) (XXVI of 2018) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Act may be called the Establishment of the
Federal Bank for Cooperatives and Regulation of Cooperative Banking (Repeal) Act, 2018.
(2) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Repeal. The Establishment of the Federal Bank for Cooperatives and Regulation of
provisions.content:
Cooperative Banking Act, 1977 (IX of 1977), is hereby repealed.
___________
